note.p: Education: City of London School (1863-1864); Royal School of Mines; St John's College, Cambridge. DSc (Cantab); Hon LLD (Dubl)

Career: Fellow of St John's College Cambridge (1882); Professor of Geology, University of Dublin (1883-1897); Fellow of Oxford University; Professor of Geology and Palaeontology, University of Oxford (1897-1936)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1936-1938 vol 2 pp 265-281, plate, by A Smith Woodward and W W Watts
